use_cases.description: Summarize findings from focus group discussions, highlighting common themes and quotes.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a UX researcher. Summarize the major themes and participant quotes from this focus group transcript about a new app prototype.

use_cases.name: Market Segmentation
use_cases.description: Segment market or consumers into groups based on survey data to tailor marketing strategies.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a data analyst. Use clustering (k-means or similar) on customer survey responses to identify distinct market segments. Describe each segment's key characteristics.

use_cases.name: Consumer Persona Development
use_cases.description: Create detailed consumer personas based on demographic and behavior research data.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a product manager. Based on the research data, draft three consumer personas (with names, demographics, and needs) for our primary target market.

use_cases.name: Customer Journey Mapping
use_cases.description: Map the steps a customer takes from awareness to purchase using qualitative data.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a customer experience specialist. Outline a customer journey map for someone buying our software service, from initial awareness through purchase and support.

use_cases.name: Usability Testing Report
use_cases.description: Generate a report of usability test findings including issues and recommendations.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a UX designer. Summarize the usability test results for the website redesign, listing key usability issues found and suggested fixes.

use_cases.name: Product Concept Evaluation
use_cases.description: Assess consumer feedback on a new product concept to estimate interest and improvements.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a product analyst. Given customer feedback on a new product mockup, summarize the level of interest and suggest any improvements to the concept.

use_cases.name: Survey Data Visualization
use_cases.description: Create charts and graphs to visualize survey results for a research presentation.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a data visualization expert. Using Python, generate charts (bar, pie, histograms) for given survey questions, and explain what each chart shows.

use_cases.name: Brand Perception Analysis
use_cases.description: Analyze customer research data to gauge public perception of a brand.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a marketing analyst. From the survey data, extract sentiment and themes about our brand image and create a summary report on brand perception.

use_cases.name: NPS Analysis
use_cases.description: Calculate and interpret Net Promoter Score (NPS) from customer survey results.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a customer success manager. Compute the NPS from provided survey data and explain what it indicates about customer loyalty. Suggest ways to improve the score.

use_cases.name: Open-Ended Response Categorization
use_cases.description: Categorize and summarize open-ended survey responses using text analysis.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a market researcher. Use natural language processing to cluster open-ended survey responses into themes and provide a summary of the most common topics mentioned.

use_cases.name: Market Needs Assessment
use_cases.description: Identify unmet customer needs by analyzing research data and feedback.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a business strategist. Based on survey and interview data, identify the top three unmet needs of customers in our market and recommend product features to address them.

use_cases.name: Questionnaire Design
use_cases.description: Design a survey questionnaire to collect primary market insights on a specific topic.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a survey expert. Draft a set of 10 questions to assess customer satisfaction with our online platform, including Likert-scale and open-ended questions.

use_cases.name: Research Plan Outline
use_cases.description: Outline a detailed plan for conducting primary market research on a new product.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a market research manager. Create an outline for a research plan to study consumer interest in a proposed mobile app, including objectives, methods, and timeline.

use_cases.name: Competitive Analysis (Primary Data)
use_cases.description: Analyze competitor products or strategies based on primary research data.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a product strategist. Summarize findings from interviews with users of competitor products, highlighting strengths and weaknesses relative to our offering.

use_cases.name: Pricing Sensitivity Analysis
use_cases.description: Determine optimal pricing from survey feedback using techniques like Van Westendorp analysis.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are an economist. Given survey data on price preferences, perform a Van Westendorp Price Sensitivity Analysis and summarize the acceptable price range for a product.

use_cases.name: Market Trend Report (Qualitative)
use_cases.description: Create a report of emerging market trends based on qualitative research findings.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a market analyst. Compile insights from customer interviews and focus groups to report on emerging preferences in personal finance apps (e.g., budgeting, investing features).

use_cases.name: User Feedback Thematic Analysis
use_cases.description: Perform thematic analysis on user feedback to identify common satisfaction drivers or pain points.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a UX researcher. Analyze customer feedback from product reviews to identify top themes driving user satisfaction and dissatisfaction.

use_cases.name: Concept Testing Results
use_cases.description: Analyze responses from a concept test to determine viability of a new product idea.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a product manager. Given survey results from a concept test for a new wearable device, determine if there is sufficient interest and what features to improve before launch.

use_cases.name: Customer Satisfaction Report
use_cases.description: Generate a report summarizing customer satisfaction levels and drivers based on research data.
use_cases.sample_prompt: You are a customer success analyst. Summarize the overall customer satisfaction from survey data and identify the top factors influencing satisfaction.
